description:
With the addition of Yui, the Light Music Club is finally ready to get rolling. Yui is excited to be part of a club for the first time in her life, and can`t wait to get started... but completely forgets that she is supposed to be the guitarist. Amazed to hear how much a guitar will cost her, she decides to go look at some options with the others on their next day off.
Source: R1 DVD
